The Editor Guide

Powerfully cross platform web application for building Documents and websites.

Get Started →

Simplicity First

The Content in the editor is build as simple and powerfully as posible to make the user to focus more on their productivity.

Power Packed

Build what ever you want with the power of The Editor, power intensive task like uploading media is just drag and drop away

Performant

The Editor can be installed like a native app and can work offline so it will deliver performance close to native applications.
